pageContent: Objective: After radical external beam radiation therapy (EBRT), local recurrence may benefit from definitive local therapy. The objective of this study was to evaluate the safety and short-term biochemical results and morbidity after salvage high-intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) treatment in patients with biopsy-proven local prostate cancer recurrence after EBRT.

metaData.source:
High Intensity Focused Ultrasound is a Good Treatment Option for Localized Prostate Cancer: Con
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/27638336/
